title: Dark Star Game Mode Unlockable Icons Question
body: Once we fulfilled the requirements for earning the icons, will we receive any sort of notification? Like I'm 99% sure I did what I was supposed to do, but it would suck to miss out if I didn't.

replies.body: Once you've unlocked the icons, you may not see them immediately. Those types of icons tend to go out in waves, and should all be given out by 5/29/17 11:59 PM PT. Be sure to check out the Dark Star 2017 page for more info, and if you haven't gotten the icons by the 29th then hit us up in a ticket.

> CORRUPTION ICON
OBTAINED BY WINNING ONE GAME OF DARK STAR: SINGULARITY WITH TWO FRIENDS

For the first icon (winning one game with two friends), do all 3 members in the premade have to be friends with each other, or does any premade team of 3 satisfy this condition as well?

The event page states that you need to play with two friends, so I'm assuming you need to actually be friends with each other on the client. It'd be pretty crazy if our client could tell who you were friends with outside of the game, but alas, we are not quite there yet. For now, you'll have to fall back on actually adding each other to your friend's list.
hey , bro i played with two of my friends and i won , also i have more then 33 killls it's been two days didn't get any icons :( pealse help bro
Those icons are still going out, so don't worry too much just yet! If you don't have it by 5/29, go ahead and shoot us a ticket letting us know!
okay , it's the third day i played with two friends and i won also i had more then 33 kills still no icons , i'll wait ty <3

Hey thank you for the advice but how about: i randomly added 2 friends from a random normal game we won that match. i know we don't get icons immediately but does it matter how long we are friends and do we still get the icons if we unfriend now?

It shouldn't matter how long you were friends, so long as you were on each other's friends list before the games were played! AFAIK, you should be free to unfriend them after winning that match. Way to use your resources to get that icon too ;)!
IIRC: Riot changed it so to get Friend's with Benefits (gift them and whatnot) you must be on each other's friend's list for 24 hours

CORRUPTION ICON
OBTAINED BY WINNING ONE GAME OF DARK STAR: SINGULARITY WITH TWO FRIENDS

I do this alredy with my friends and they recive the icon, but im still waiting... I played the games with them and i dont have nothing and they have corruption icon

People asking the same question 20x in a row.. How long has it been now.. The past.. Year or so? THat you do not get your ICONS RIGHT AWAY! They even tell you in posts themselves about how you should be waiting up to a few weeks to get your icons. Learn to read :( Society is killing me.

Oh God the irony. The question was asking if we will receive a notification for completing the requirements to earn the icon, not the icon itself. Riot did this with the Devil Teemo icon. Read before posting. Society is killing me...
What are the requirements for earning the icons?

CORRUPTION ICON
OBTAINED BY WINNING ONE GAME OF DARK STAR: SINGULARITY WITH TWO FRIENDS

COSMIC RUINS ICON
OBTAINED BY GETTING 33 KILLS ACROSS DARK STAR: SINGULARITY GAMES

To clear things up a bit, the keyword here is **across**. Basically the intent is that you need to accumulate 33 kills on Dark Star across all matches. Once you've hit the 33 kill mark, even if it's after your 50th game, you should be getting the Cosmic Ruins Icon!
But for the cosmic ruins icon: how u need that 33 kills?
I agree. Is it cumulative or must it be 33 kills in 1 game ?
over the course of multiple games, so yes cumulative
Me and two other friends played and won this game mode once. But none of us have yet to receive the Corruption Icon yet. Is this icon still be given out to players as of 5/29?

alls i see is that there are 2 icons , corruption and cosmic ruins, i have 3(including the old one when dark star thresh came out) but there is a 4th one thats like the ruins on but without the ruins, just the blue pillar with the cylinder around it, how do i obtain that one?
You mean the icon that came out with Cosmic Blade Master Yi?
2 ppl add me got no friends lol
i got my "play with friends" icon, but still haven't gotten my kills icon. I have over 100 kills. Rip Rito.
Is there a time limit to obtain the icons? Or is it up until the event ends on May 15th?

> [{quoted}](name=TheWaddlingTank,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0g0AIBQJ,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-05-07T22:09:55.453+0000)
>
> Is there a time limit to obtain the icons? Or is it up until the event ends on May 15th?

You can get the icons as long as the gamemode is up.
Once the game mode is gone you can't unlock the icons

Do I have to have 33 Kills or does my team have to to obtain the icon? 
like 33 in one game for my team , or just for me? And does it have to be in just one game or does it stack up in multiple games?
i have 37 kills so far... still no icon . anyone help ?
Are the two icons going out in separate waves?  I fulfilled the requirements for both, but only recieved the Cosmic Ruins icon so far
same, so they must be
If you have a chat restriction will you still be able to receive icons? I may be a easy "tilter" but I just got 33 kills and I've not got the icon.
How do i know i have done the 33 total kills ?
Match history + counting
Do I have to have 33 in 1 game or many games ?

I know at least for the 33 kills that you get it over multiple games. It does not need to be in one match. I got the icon the next day for that, as did my brother. Haven't tried for the corruption icon but I would assume teaming with 2 people from your friends list.
